item.description:
Over the years at Organic Garden Cafe; Loren Lockman has shared incredible information about the massive importance of hydration and the 8 Essentials to Optimal Health & Vibrancy.

**********************************************
Maximum Health Now! with Loren Lockman

Price: Special $30 for Meetup (last year this event cost $50 for 3 hours!), Register at the Organic Garden or call 978/922-0004

20% OFF at Organic Garden til 5:30pm! (before & after event)

* How to prevent - and reverse --aging. Really!
* The 3 critical paradigm shifts you need to create and maintain perfect health
* Why you're severely dehydrated, how it affects you, and what you can do about it
* Why the average US diet is like a bicycle that's been run over by a train...
* What you can depend on to stay as healthy as possible (it's not alternative medicine or nutrition!)
* The 8 keys to optimal health...and more!

Go to Loren's website for his healing center Tanglewood Wellness Center, http://www.tanglewoodwellnesscenter.com/about-tanglewood/our-staff/ and read more about Loren and his work.

Consider what it would be like to experience proper hydration, circulation, clear breathing all day and night, abundant energy, clear thinking, great skin and more! Raw foods, juicing, green smoothies, salads & bowls, fresh fruit every morning, can help get you there and Loren may give you a few more tips!

Sincerely,

Robert Reid
Organic Garden Cafe
item.name: Maximum Health Now! - Loren Lockman
